edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.reports
Class RationaleReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.reports.RationaleReportGenerator

public class RationaleReportGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

A Report Generator Object Will Create A Report For The Rationale. Once the constructor completes, the method getReport() can be used to retrieve the generated report Supported report formats currently include:

  • PLAIN - Plain Text

Constructor Detail

RationaleReportGenerator

public RationaleReportGenerator(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell,
                                java.lang.Object sel,
                                int format,
                                boolean argOntn)
Construct A Report Generator Using A Set Of Selected Nodes in the rationale tree. Once the report generator is constructed the report can be retrieved with getReport()

Parameters:
shell - The Shell Object Which Owns The Rationale Tree
sel - The Selected Nodes In The Rationale Tree Should Be Of Type IStructuredSelection
format - The Report Format To Be Generated (use PLAIN)
Method Detail

plainRecurse

private void plainRecurse(TreeObject[] children)
Recurse through the rationale tree and generate a text based representation of the elements in the tree.

Parameters:
children - An Array Of Children To Generate Report Information For

getReport

public java.lang.String getReport()
Accessor Method To Retrieve The Current State Of The Report Generation

Returns:
a string containing the report
